c:complexType.name: CartesianChartCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class for the Cartesian charts.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for various visual elements of the cartesian charts.

c:property.name: visualRoles
c:property.c:documentation: The options of visual roles that are common to (almost) all cartesian chart types.

c:complexType.name: CartesianCommonVisualRoles
c:complexType.c:documentation: The visual roles common to (almost) all cartesian chart types.

c:property.name: series
c:property.c:documentation:
The series visual role represents a series of connected data points.
Most cartesian charts show the connectedness of data points of a given series in some way, by connecting points with a line, by giving them all the same color, or, simply, by the order in which they are drawn, and when overlapped, some stay on top of others.
The series visual role automatically binds to every dimension whose name has the series prefix.
The visual role itself is optional, yet, when unbound, a dimension with a "series" prefix is automatically created for it, and all datums will have the value null in that dimension.
The only cartesian chart type that does not support the series visual role is the Box Plot.
See for more information on supported data types.

c:complexType.name: CartesianCommonExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation: The extension points common to all cartesian chart types.

c:property.name: xAxisGrid
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the grid line rules that are drawn one per major tick of the XX axis (an horizontal axis has vertical grid line rules).

c:property.name: yAxisGrid
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the grid line rules that are drawn one per major tick of the YY axis (a vertical axis has horizontal grid line rules).

c:property.name: xAxisZeroLine
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the zero line rule that is drawn on the 0-valued tick, when there is one (an horizontal axis has a vertical zero line rule).

c:property.name: yAxisZeroLine
c:property.c:documentation: The extension point of the zero line rule that is drawn on the 0-valued tick, when there is one (a vertical axis has an horizontal zero line rule).

c:complexType.name: CartesianPlotCommonOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation: The common options documentation class of cartesian plots.
